name: introduction-to-html-and-css
description: an introduction to HTML and CSS

scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.build:css:prod: node-sass src/_sass/main.scss -x --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -u cssnano --no-map > public/css/main.css
scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:eleventy:dev
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css:prod && npm run build:eleventy:prod
scripts.watch:css: onchange --await-write-finish 4000 'src/_sass/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:eleventy:dev

author: Martin Chorley
